title: is writing out a ticket to report a booster worth it?
body:
so i had an obvious booster in my game,the guys plays tryn/yi top jungle in his whole match history then the past 6 games just out of the blue plays ap midlaners with extremely good kda's for someone whos never or barely played mid.

Normally i wouldn't care and just move onto the next game but they were just being arrogant in all chat so i wanted to report it to riot... but is it even worth the effort.... how likely is anything to even happen?

replies.body: i've reported people like that before and got reply popup about them being banned

A booster being arrogant to other players are not very professional 
A booster is usually someone who is quiet and just stays focus on the game aka they only say what they need in the purpose of winning the game like getting dragons, barons and turrets
Maybe it was just one of his/her challenger friends borrowing and playing on the account
